Uses of Class
com.eduworks.ec.framework.view.EcScreen

  • Packages that use EcScreen 
    Package Description
    com.eduworks.ec.framework  
    com.eduworks.ec.framework.history  
    com.eduworks.ec.framework.view  

    • Uses of EcScreen in com.eduworks.ec.framework

      Fields in com.eduworks.ec.framework declared as EcScreen 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static EcScreen ScreenManager.defaultScreen
      Screen to be set by application on application startup, dictates what the screen should be if the startup Screen hasn't been set
      static EcScreen ScreenManager.LOADING_STARTUP_PAGE
      Screen to be used when another screen is loading information from the server before being able to display itself.
      static EcScreen ScreenManager.startupScreen
      Screen to be set by application if it notices that a certain screen should be loaded on startup that is different from the default Screen
      Methods in com.eduworks.ec.framework that return EcScreen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EcScreen ScreenManager.getCurrentScreen()
      Retrieves the current view that corresponds to the Screen Container Element (Should be a screen)
      Methods in com.eduworks.ec.framework with parameters of type EcScreen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ScreenManager.addHistory(EcScreen screen, java.lang.String displayContainerId)
      Adds the screen passed in and the display container to a HistoryClosure element and pushes it on the end of the history cache array.
      static void ScreenManager.changeScreen(EcScreen page, java.lang.Boolean addHistory, org.stjs.javascript.functions.Callback0 callback)
      Set's the current screen, then show's it by calling the display function.
      static void ScreenManager.replaceHistory(EcScreen screen, java.lang.String displayContainerId, java.lang.Object params)
      Replaces the current end of the history array with a new HistoryClosure element that contains the screen and containerId passed in.
      static void ScreenManager.replaceScreen(EcScreen page, org.stjs.javascript.functions.Callback0 callback)
      Set's the current screen, then show's it by calling the display function.
      static void ScreenManager.setDefaultScreen(EcScreen page)
      Sets the application default Screen that is shown if no startup screen has been defined.

    • Uses of EcScreen in com.eduworks.ec.framework.history

      Fields in com.eduworks.ec.framework.history declared as EcScreen 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      EcScreen HistoryClosure.screen
      Screen to store and associate with the page name so that it can be loaded if necessary
      Constructors in com.eduworks.ec.framework.history with parameters of type EcScreen 
      Constructor and Description
      HistoryClosure(java.lang.String name, EcScreen screen, java.lang.String containerId)
      Constructor for the HistoryClosure Object

    • Uses of EcScreen in com.eduworks.ec.framework.view

      Subclasses of EcScreen in com.eduworks.ec.framework.view 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EcOverlay
      Subclass of view for an overlay, extends EcScreen because overlays should have a display name that can be used in the URL bar and in the history so the page can be loaded on back button or startup
